definition: France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])

pinyin: shou4 fa3 lu:4 bao3 hu4 quan2

sentences.english: Of these four things , the first is your legal due.
sentences.chinese: 这四种中的第一件是你法律上应享的权力。

sentences.english: Perfecting the contract text and avoid legal loss.
sentences.chinese: 完善合同文本，避免法律损失。

sentences.english: The powers and functions of the district organizations and the method for their formation shall be prescribed by law.
sentences.chinese: 第九十八条区域组织的职权和组成方法由法律规定。

sentences.english: The law punishes people who invade the fights of others.
sentences.chinese: 法律惩罚侵犯他人权利的人。

sentences.english: As to whether this accords with legal principle, it is disputable.
sentences.chinese: 但是否符合法律原理，却值得商榷。

sentences.english: The stipulation of ongoing law is a little fragmentary and omits some necessary provisions.
sentences.chinese: 现行法律的规定略嫌零散，而且存在着盲区。

sentences.english: It is also a fundamental tool for the rule laying down policy and law .
sentences.chinese: 它是统治者制定政策与法律的立脚点。

sentences.english: Be strictly compliance with laws and regulations, and to ensure food safety from product design.
sentences.chinese: 严格遵守法律法规，食品安全从产品设计抓起。

sentences.english: The negotiating groups have developed consolidated legal text in virtually all negotiating groups.
sentences.chinese: 谈判小组在几乎所有的谈判中均已完成法律文本合并。

sentences.english: The 1961 law forbidding dowries further undermined traditional Hinduism.
sentences.chinese: 1961年，法律更进一步地破坏印度教传统的嫁妆。

sentences.english: Consult your legal counsel if you have any doubts about reusing content.
sentences.chinese: 若对重用内容有任何疑问，请咨询您的法律顾问。

sentences.english: We studied many lawbooks and he knows what I would say.
sentences.chinese: 我们研究了许多法律书籍，所以他知道我的意见。

sentences.english: In addition, AACM is now in the process of drafting safety regulations.
sentences.chinese: 另外，民航局现正为安全法规进行法律草拟。

sentences.english: The bad police officer in that movie thought he was above the law.
sentences.chinese: 那部电影中的坏警察自认不受法律的约束。

sentences.english: Chapter III discusses the legal foundations of fault liability in conclusion contract.
sentences.chinese: 第三章，缔约过失责任的法律基础。

sentences.english: In addition, some laws to forbid any hunting of rare animals should be passed.
sentences.chinese: 此外，人们还应制定一些法律禁止捕杀珍稀动物。
